content:
SoapBinding Class

In this Article

Represents an extension added to a Binding within an XML Web service. This class cannot be inherited.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Web.Services.Configuration.XmlFormatExtension("binding", "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/", typeof(System.Web.Services.Description.Binding))]
[System.Web.Services.Configuration.XmlFormatExtensionPrefix("soap", "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/")]
[System.Web.Services.Configuration.XmlFormatExtensionPrefix("soapenc", "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/")]
public class SoapBinding : System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension
  • SoapBinding

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,

,

,

,
Parent
,
Required

Remarks

This class specifies that the data transmission will use the SOAP protocol version 1.1.

For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]. For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

Constructors summary

SoapBinding()

Initializes an instance of the SoapBinding class.

Fields summary

HttpTransport

Gets the URI for the standard protocol specifying HTTP transmission of SOAP data. This field is constant.
Namespace

Gets the URI for the XML namespace of the SoapBinding class. This field is constant.

Properties summary

Schema

Gets the binding schema that is to be used to transmit data by using the SOAP protocol version 1.1.
Style

Specifies the type of SOAP binding used by the current SoapBinding.
Transport

Gets or sets the URI with the specification for HTTP transmission of SOAP data.

Constructors

  • SoapBinding()

    Initializes an instance of the SoapBinding class.

    public SoapBinding ();

Fields

  • HttpTransport

    Gets the URI for the standard protocol specifying HTTP transmission of SOAP data. This field is constant.

    public const string HttpTransport;

    Remarks

    The field value is "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http/".

    Example

             SoapBinding mySoapBinding = new SoapBinding();
         mySoapBinding.Transport = SoapBinding.HttpTransport;
         mySoapBinding.Style = SoapBindingStyle.Document;

       SoapBinding^ mySoapBinding = gcnew SoapBinding;
   mySoapBinding->Transport = SoapBinding::HttpTransport;
   mySoapBinding->Style = SoapBindingStyle::Document;

          Dim mySoapBinding As New SoapBinding()
      mySoapBinding.Transport = SoapBinding.HttpTransport
      mySoapBinding.Style = SoapBindingStyle.Document
  • Namespace

    Gets the URI for the XML namespace of the SoapBinding class. This field is constant.

    public const string Namespace;

    Remarks

    The field value is "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/".

    Example

       SoapBinding^ mySoapBinding = gcnew SoapBinding;
   mySoapBinding->Transport = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http";
   mySoapBinding->Style = SoapBindingStyle::Document;
   // Get the URI for XML namespace of the SoapBinding class.
   String^ myNameSpace = SoapBinding::Namespace;
   Console::WriteLine( "The URI of the XML Namespace is :{0}", myNameSpace );

          Dim mySoapBinding As New SoapBinding()
      mySoapBinding.Transport = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"
      mySoapBinding.Style = SoapBindingStyle.Document
      ' Get the URI for XML namespace of the SoapBinding class.
      Dim myNameSpace As String = SoapBinding.Namespace
      Console.WriteLine("The URI of the XML Namespace is :" + myNameSpace)

             SoapBinding mySoapBinding = new SoapBinding();
         mySoapBinding.Transport = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http";
         mySoapBinding.Style = SoapBindingStyle.Document;
         // Get the URI for XML namespace of the SoapBinding class.
         String myNameSpace = SoapBinding.Namespace;
         Console.WriteLine("The URI of the XML Namespace is :"+myNameSpace);

Properties

  • Schema

    Gets the binding schema that is to be used to transmit data by using the SOAP protocol version 1.1.

    public static System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema Schema { get; }

    Property Value

    • XmlSchema

      An XmlSchema object that represents the binding schema that is to be used to transmit data by using the SOAP protocol version 1.1.

  • Style

    Specifies the type of SOAP binding used by the current SoapBinding.

    public System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingStyle Style { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • SoapBindingStyle

      One of the SoapBindingStyle values. The default is Document.

    Example

             SoapBinding mySoapBinding = new SoapBinding();
         mySoapBinding.Transport = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http";
         mySoapBinding.Style = SoapBindingStyle.Document;
         // Add the 'SoapBinding' object to the 'Binding' object.
         myBinding.Extensions.Add(mySoapBinding);

       SoapBinding^ mySoapBinding = gcnew SoapBinding;
   mySoapBinding->Transport = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http";
   mySoapBinding->Style = SoapBindingStyle::Document;

   // Add the 'SoapBinding' object to the 'Binding' object.
   myBinding->Extensions->Add( mySoapBinding );

          Dim mySoapBinding As New SoapBinding()
      mySoapBinding.Transport = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"
      mySoapBinding.Style = SoapBindingStyle.Document
      ' Add the 'SoapBinding' object to the 'Binding' object.
      myBinding.Extensions.Add(mySoapBinding)
  • Transport

    Gets or sets the URI with the specification for HTTP transmission of SOAP data.

    public string Transport { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string value representing the URI for the specification for data transmission by means of SOAP. The default is an empty string ("").

    Remarks

    This required property value will generally be the same as that of the HttpTransport field. However, this property value can be any URI for data-transmission specifications, for example, SMTP or FTP.

    Example

    SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#2
